``` Hello World!

Hello World from Windows container!

```

```
FROM mcr.microsoft.com/windows/servercore/iis:windowsservercore-1903

RUN powershell -NoProfile -Command Remove-Item -Recurse C:\inetpub\wwwroot\*
WORKDIR /inetpub/wwwroot
COPY index.html .
```
